name: NoobaVSS-Video Surveillance System
tagline: Have your own smart surveillance system
body:
### NoobaVSS Video Surveillance System
Deploy your own Smart Surveillance System now for free!

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```
###NoobaVSS
[NoobaVSS](https://github.com/Asitha/NoobaVSS) is the main platform which serves plug-ins, and provide user interface.

###NoobaVSS Plug-ins
Plug-ins consist of different functionalities suitable for different tasks. As a collection of plug-ins, any specific surveillance context can be addressed.

Several widely applicable set of plug-ins available. You can build your own too.

#### Background Subtraction

#### Blob Tracking and Tagging

#### Abandoned Object Detector

#### Blob Counting

#### Face Detection

#### Face Based Anomaly Detection

#### Speed Mismatch


 

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Designer Templates
We've crafted some handsome templates for you to use. Go ahead and continue to layouts to browse through them. You can easily go back to edit your page before publishing. After publishing your page, you can revisit the page generator and switch to another theme. Your Page content will be preserved if it remained markdown format.

### Rather Drive Stick?
If you prefer to not use the automatic generator, push a branch named `gh-pages` to your repository to create a page manually. In addition to supporting regular HTML content, GitHub Pages support Jekyll, a simple, blog aware static site generator written by our own Tom Preston-Werner. Jekyll makes it easy to create site-wide headers and footers without having to copy them across every page. It also offers intelligent blog support and other advanced templating features.

### Authors and Contributors
Asitha Nanayakkara (@Asitha), Chathuranga Hettiarachchi (@hachat), Charith Wijenayake (@charithwije) Ayesha Dissanayake (@ayeshsandu) 

Supervised by Dr. Chathura De Silva

Department of Computer Science and Engineering,
University of Moratuwa,
Sri Lanka

### Support or Contact
Contact authors for any clarification.
